featured.text: “You expect us to play seven days a week for 40 five rupees!”
When do you expect him back?
Under the _____ of newly elected president Barack Obama, the US is expected to turn a new page in politics and economy.
The EPA estimates that the average levels of dioxin in all Americans are so high that we can expect to see a variety of health effects, including cancer.
Salesmen expect digital cameras to be popular gifts this holiday season.

other.text: How did the volunteers learn to expect different levels of heat?

But as the magic fades and daily life __(33)__, it happens that men, forgetting that men and women are supposed to be different, continue to expect women to think and react the way men do; women, __(34)__, expect men to feel and behave the way women do.
We shall expect you at eight o’clock; , it’s an informal dinner.
But don’t expect it to measure your pet’s IQ.
Since the orange trees suffered _____ damage from a storm in the summer, the farmers are expecting a sharp decline in harvests this winter.
The researchers found that the parts of the brain involved in learning, memory, emotion, and touch became more active as the volunteers expected higher levels of pain.
Business, however, was not 27 he had expected.
An ______ person is usually pleasant and easy to get along with, but don’t expect that he or she will always say “yes” to everything.
If you expect to have quick ________ of the goods, it is better to have them airmailed.
Global sales of hard hats totaled USD 2.1 billion in 2016, and are expected to reach USD 3.19 billion in 2025. 39.
Research suggests that people with outgoing personalities tend to be more _____, often expecting that good things will happen.
Interestingly, when the volunteers expected only mild or moderate pain but experienced severe pain, they reported feeling 28 percent less pain than when they expected severe pain and actually got it.

definition.zh_def: 期待，預期某事會發生或某人會做某事。
definition.en_def: To regard something as likely to happen or to anticipate a certain outcome.
definition.example: I expect to receive my package by tomorrow.
